appDescription.message: A little delight goes a long way. Too much delight ruins the fun.

settings__devMessage.message: This extension is still being developed... so it's like pre-beta. If you have a complaint you'll have to work through the issue yourself... maybe do some yoga, snap some twigs, or throw stones in the water... whatever makes you feel better.

settings__settingPercentChance.message: Choose percentage chance of getting a delight
